!1 !-SshFixture-! key pair authentication
Key pair authentication can be executed via option definition. Involved options are the following:
 1 [[!-PrivateKey-!][<UserGuide.Options.EndpointOptions.PrivateKey]]
 1 [[!-Passphrase-!][<UserGuide.Options.EndpointOptions.Passphrase]]
 1 [[!-PublicKey-!][<UserGuide.Options.EndpointOptions.PublicKey]]

Note: keys must have RSA format with default session (jsch).
